posts.post_content: I am looking for these five T205 cards: Addie Joss, Eddie Collins mouth open, [STRIKE]Johnny Evers, Ed Walsh, and Walter Johnson.[/STRIKE]  I prefer these to be in poor to fair condition, I might be able to do "good" condition at the highest.  I am only looking to spend the going rate of these cards, nothing severly overpriced.  If you have what I am looking for please send me a PM.
